Articles.Content:
After a sudden system crash I had a problem with a corrupted persistent.sfs save file (the file still had the right size, but it looked empty when opened with a editor), and the program didn't let me recover the entire career savegame. It was not the 1st time it happened but this time I used the Recuva (Windows) to search for the file in its folder and then simply "recover" it.

Worked like a charm!

I hope it can help you!
